00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 enum outlets{
00013         k_outlet_thru = 0,
00014         k_outlet_dumpout,
00015         num_outlets
00016 };
00017 
00018 
00019 typedef struct _return{                                                 // Data Structure for this object
00020         t_jcom_core_subscriber_extended common;
00021         void                                                    *outlets[num_outlets];                  // my outlet array
00022         t_atom                                                  output[512];                                    // buffer that gets sent to the hub
00023         short                                                   output_len;
00024 } t_return;
00025 
00026 
00027 // Prototypes
00028 void*           return_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00029 void            return_assist(t_return *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00030 void            return_bang(t_return *x);
00031 void            return_int(t_return *x, long n);
00032 void            return_float(t_return *x, double f);
00033 void            return_symbol(t_return *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00034 void            return_list(t_return *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00035 void            return_send_feedback(t_return *x);
00036 void            return_dump(t_return *x);
00037 t_max_err       return_attr_gettype(t_return *x, void *attr, long *argc, t_atom **argv);
00038 
00039 
00040 // Globals
00041 t_class         *return_class;                          // Required: Global pointer for our class
00042 
00043 
00044 /************************************************************************************/
00045 // Class Definition
00046 
00047 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00048 {
00049         t_class         *c;
00050         t_object        *attr = NULL;
00051         long            offset;
00052         long            obexoffset;     
00053 
00054         jamoma_init();
00055 
00056         // Define our class
00057         c = class_new("jcom.return",(method)return_new, (method)jcom_core_subscriber_common_free, 
00058                 (short)sizeof(t_return), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00059         offset = calcoffset(t_return, common);
00060         obexoffset = offset + calcoffset(t_jcom_core_subscriber_common, obex);
00061         class_obexoffset_set(c, offset + calcoffset(t_jcom_core_subscriber_common, obex));
00062         
00063         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_bang,                                 "bang",                 A_CANT, 0L);
00065         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_int,                                  "int",                  A_DEFLONG,      0L);
00066         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_float,                                "float",                A_DEFFLOAT,     0L);
00067         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_list,                                 "list",                 A_GIMME, 0L);
00068         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_symbol,                               "anything",             A_GIMME, 0L);
00069         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_dump,                                 "dump",                 0L);
00070         class_addmethod(c, (method)return_assist,                               "assist",               A_CANT, 0L); 
00071 
00072         jcom_core_subscriber_classinit_extended(c, attr, offset);
00073         
00074         // ATTRIBUTE: type - options are msg_generic, msg_int, msg_float, msg_symbol, msg_toggle
00075         jamoma_class_attr_new(c, "type", _sym_symbol,
00076                 (method)0, (method)return_attr_gettype,
00077                 calcoffset(t_jcom_core_subscriber_extended, attr_type));
00078         
00079         // Finalize our class
00080         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00081         return_class = c;
00082         
00083         return 0;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 /************************************************************************************/
00088 // Object Life
00089 
00090 void *return_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00091 {
00092         long            attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);
00093         t_return        *x = (t_return *)object_alloc(return_class);
00094         t_symbol        *name = _sym_nothing;
00095 
00096         if(attrstart && argv)
00097                 atom_arg_getsym(&name, 0, attrstart, argv);
00098         else
00099                 name = symbol_unique();
00100 
00101         if(x){
00102                 x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout] = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00103                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object *)x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout]);
00104                 x->outlets[k_outlet_thru] = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00105 
00106                 jcom_core_subscriber_new_extended(&x->common, name, ps_subscribe_return);
00107                 atom_setsym(&x->output[0], name);
00108                 x->output_len = 1;
00109                 
00110                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                       // handle attribute args
00111                 defer_low(x, (method)jcom_core_subscriber_subscribe, 0, 0, 0);
00112         }
00113         return (x);                                                                             // return the pointer to our new instantiation
00114 }
00115 
00116 /************************************************************************************/
00117 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00118 
00119 // Method for Assistance Messages
00120 void return_assist(t_return *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00121 {
00122         if(msg==1)                                              // Inlet
00123                 strcpy(dst, "data to return via jcom.hub");
00124         else{                                                   // Outlets
00125                 switch(arg){
00126                         case k_outlet_dumpout:
00127                                         strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00128                                         break;
00129                 }
00130         }               
00131 }
00132 
00133 // DUMP: use for debugging - dump state to the Max window
00134 void return_dump(t_return *x)
00135 {
00136         char    s[256];
00137         t_atom  a[4];
00138         
00139         if(x->common.hub != NULL){
00140                 sprintf(s, "%s:clipmode", x->common.attr_name->s_name);
00141                 atom_setsym(&a[0], gensym(s));
00142                 atom_setsym(&a[1], x->common.attr_clipmode);
00143                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_feedback, 2, a, NULL);
00144 
00145                 sprintf(s, "%s:description", x->common.attr_name->s_name);
00146                 atom_setsym(&a[0], gensym(s));
00147                 atom_setsym(&a[1], x->common.attr_description);
00148                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_feedback, 2, a, NULL);
00149 /* TODO: Should we add ramping ability to this object?
00150                 sprintf(s, "%s:ramp", x->common.attr_name->s_name);
00151                 atom_setsym(&a[0], gensym(s));
00152                 atom_setsym(&a[1], x->attr_ramp);
00153                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_feedback, 2, a, NULL);
00154 */
00155                 sprintf(s, "%s:range", x->common.attr_name->s_name);
00156                 atom_setsym(&a[0], gensym(s));
00157                 atom_setfloat(&a[1], x->common.attr_range[0]);
00158                 atom_setfloat(&a[2], x->common.attr_range[1]);
00159                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_feedback, 3, a, NULL);
00160 
00161                 sprintf(s, "%s:repetitions", x->common.attr_name->s_name);
00162                 atom_setsym(&a[0], gensym(s));
00163                 atom_setlong(&a[1], x->common.attr_repetitions);
00164                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_feedback, 2, a, NULL);
00165 
00166                 sprintf(s, "%s:type", x->common.attr_name->s_name);
00167                 atom_setsym(&a[0], gensym(s));
00168                 atom_setsym(&a[1], x->common.attr_type);
00169                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_feedback, 2, a, NULL);
00170         }
00171 }

00173 
00174 t_max_err return_attr_gettype(t_return *x, void *attr, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00175 {
00176         *argc = 1;
00177         if (!(*argv)) // otherwise use memory passed in
00178                 *argv = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom));
00179         atom_setsym(*argv, x->common.attr_type);
00180 
00181         jamoma_class_attr_get_sender((t_object*)x, attr, *argc, *argv);
00182         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 // Return values to the hub (so it can return them to the outside world)
00187 void return_send_feedback(t_return *x)
00188 {
00189         if(x->common.hub != NULL){
00190                 if(x->common.has_wildcard)
00191                         object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_return_extended, x->output_len, x->output, NULL);
00192                 else
00193                         object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_return, x->output_len, x->output, NULL);
00194         }
00195         x->output_len = 1;      // truncate to just the name of this jcom.return object
00196 }
00197 
00198 
00199 // BANG INPUT - this sends the OSC name with no additional arguments
00200 void return_bang(t_return *x)
00201 {
00202         x->output_len = 1;
00203         if(x->common.hub != NULL)
00204                 object_method_typed(x->common.hub, ps_return, x->output_len, x->output, NULL);
00205         
00206         outlet_anything(x->outlets[k_outlet_thru], x->common.attr_name, 0, NULL);
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 // INT INPUT
00211 void return_int(t_return *x, long value)
00212 {
00213         atom_setlong(&x->output[1], value);
00214         x->output_len = 2;
00215         return_send_feedback(x);
00216 
00217         outlet_int(x->outlets[k_outlet_thru], value);
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 // FLOAT INPUT
00222 void return_float(t_return *x, double value)
00223 {
00224         atom_setfloat(&x->output[1], value);
00225         x->output_len = 2;
00226         return_send_feedback(x);
00227         
00228         outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_thru], value); 
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 // SYMBOL INPUT
00233 void return_symbol(t_return *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00234 {
00235         short i;
00236 
00237         atom_setsym(&x->output[1], msg);
00238         x->output_len++;
00239         
00240         for(i=1; i<=argc; i++){
00241                 jcom_core_atom_copy(&x->output[i+1], argv++);
00242                 x->output_len++;
00243         }       
00244         
00245         outlet_anything(x->outlets[k_outlet_thru], msg, x->output_len-2, &x->output[2]);
00246         return_send_feedback(x);
00247 }
00248 
00249 // LIST INPUT 
00250 void return_list(t_return *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00251 {
00252         short i;
00253         
00254         for(i=1; i<=argc; i++){
00255                 jcom_core_atom_copy(&x->output[i], argv++);
00256                 x->output_len++;
00257         }
00258         outlet_anything(x->outlets[k_outlet_thru], msg, x->output_len-1, &x->output[1]);
00259         return_send_feedback(x);
00260 }
